oai_dc:dc.dc:description: li-Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Khafājī.

On t.p.: "Wa-tarjamat al-muʼallif mabsuṭah fī ḥarf al-alif min khulāṣat al-athar al-maṭbūʻah bi-al-Maṭbaʻah al-Wahbīyah wa-manqūl minhā fī al-juzʼ al-awwal min ḥāshīyatihi ʻalá tafsīr al-Bayḍāwī al-maṭbūʻah bi-Maṭbaʻat Būlāq wa-min taʼlīfātihi Shifāʼ al-ghalīl wa-huwa ayḍan maṭbūʻ bi-al-Maṭbaʻah al-Wahbīyah wa-kulluhā qad qāma bi-al-nafaqah ʻalayhā al-muḥibb li-nashr al-maʻārif Saʻādat Muḥammad Bāshā ʻĀrif".
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arabic literature
Arabic literature--History and criticism
